name: Animal Matcher
description:
(Use the fullscreen button in the bottom right if it's too large for your browser!)

Animal Matcher - Created for the weekly game jam #152. The theme was "Shelter".

You must analyze animals and match them with potential new owners. Use logic and strategy to figure out which animal best suits which person. Make everyone happy to win!

This was our first game jam, and we had a lot of fun making it.

Most art were from free assets from the internet. Game developed by Sean and Mark.Music was created by Sean.
